data.comment: The match is underway in Ufa.
Tambov to take a throw-in in Ufa territory.
In the minute 2, Tambov have been awarded a corner by Alexey Valerievich Matyunin.
German Onugha (Tambov) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
Ball goes out of play for a Ufa goal kick.
In the minute 3, Alexey Valerievich Matyunin signals a Ufa throw-in in Tambov's half.
Throw-in for Tambov at Neftyanik Stadium.
Ball safe as Ufa is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 4, Alexey Valerievich Matyunin awards Tambov a goal kick.
Corner awarded to Ufa.
Ufa attack but Vladislav Kamilov's header doesn't find the target.
In the minute 7, It's a goal kick for the away team in Ufa.
Can Ufa capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Alexey Valerievich Matyunin signals a free kick to Tambov.
Timur Zhamaletdinov puts the ball in the net and the home team now lead 1-0.
In the minute 11, Oleg Danchenko with an assist there.
Corner awarded to Tambov.
In the minute 12, Can Tambov capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Ufa's half?
Goal kick for Ufa at Neftyanik Stadium.
In the minute 15, Free kick for Tambov in the half of Ufa.
Aleksey Gritsaenko is booked for the away team.
Alexey Valerievich Matyunin signals a free kick to Ufa in their own half.
Can Ufa get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Tambov's half?
In the minute 18, Tambov have a goal kick.
Alexey Valerievich Matyunin awards Tambov a goal kick.
Timur Zhamaletdinov of Ufa smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 20, Vyacheslav Krotov for Ufa gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Ufa.
Throw-in for Ufa in the half of Tambov.
In the minute 22, Alexey Valerievich Matyunin signals a free kick to Tambov just outside Ufa's area.
Ufa's Timur Zhamaletdinov is back in action after a slight knock.
Alexey Valerievich Matyunin waits before resuming play because Timur Zhamaletdinov for Ufa is still down.
In the minute 27, In Ufa Tambov's German Onugha is caught offside.
Vyacheslav Krotov (Ufa) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Artem Golubev for Ufa drives towards goal at Neftyanik Stadium. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 30, Play has been interrupted briefly in Ufa to check on Mikhail Kostyukov, who is grimacing with pain.
Mikhail Kostyukov for Tambov is back on the field again.
Ufa are whistled for offside.
In the minute 34, Free kick Tambov.
Ufa have a goal kick.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 37, Aleksey Gritsaenko (Tambov) has been booked for the second time by the referee and is off!
In Ufa a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Free kick for Tambov in their own half.
In the minute 39, German Onugha is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
Tambov awarded a free kick in their own half.
German Onugha returns to the field for Tambov after picking up a slight injury.
In Ufa, Ufa push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
In the minute 42, Mikhail Kostyukov (Tambov) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 43, Free kick for Ufa in their own half.
Tambov make their first substitution with Nikita Chicherin replacing Aleksandre Karapetian.
Ufa's Timur Zhamaletdinov gets in a shot on goal at Neftyanik Stadium. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Alexey Valerievich Matyunin will wait an extra 2 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 1st half.
In the minute 45, In Ufa a free kick has been awarded the away team.
The first-half is over.
In the minute 45, Ufa take a comfortable 2-0 lead thanks to Vladislav Kamilov.
Grigori Morozov instrumental with a fine assist.
Artem Golubev (Ufa) gets a yellow card. He will be suspended from the next match!
The second-half is now underway.
In the minute 46, The away team have replaced Maksim Volodjko with Anton Kilin. This is the second substitution made today by Sergey Pervushin.
Ufa's Vladislav Kamilov is on target but unsuccessful.
Ufa advance rapidly upfield but Alexey Valerievich Matyunin blows for offside.
In the minute 48, Timur Zhamaletdinov (Ufa) has received a yellow card from Alexey Valerievich Matyunin.
German Onugha for Tambov has been booked by Alexey Valerievich Matyunin and receives a first yellow card.
Alexey Valerievich Matyunin signals a free kick to Ufa in their own half.
In the minute 49, Tambov awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Ufa in their own half.
Vyacheslav Krotov of Ufa gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 52, Goal kick for Tambov at Neftyanik Stadium.
Alexey Valerievich Matyunin signals a free kick to Ufa.
Ufa have been awarded a corner by Alexey Valerievich Matyunin.
In the minute 54, Timur Zhamaletdinov puts the ball in the net and the home team extend their lead. The score-line now reads 3-0.
That's a fine assist from Oleg Danchenko.
Alexey Valerievich Matyunin blows against Tambov's Mikhail Kostyukov for offside.
In the minute 56, The match at Neftyanik Stadium has been interrupted briefly for a check on Oleksandr Kaplienko, who is down injured.
Oleksandr Kaplienko is back on the pitch.
Tambov drives forward and Aleksey Rybin gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 61, In Ufa Ufa attack through Vyacheslav Krotov. The finish is off target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Tambov goal kick.
Sebastien Thill is replacing Mikhail Kostyukov for Tambov at Neftyanik Stadium.
In the minute 63, Throw-in for Tambov in their own half.
Goal kick for Ufa at Neftyanik Stadium.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 68, Ufa's Jemal Tabidze misses with an attempt on goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Tambov goal kick.
Alexey Valerievich Matyunin signals a free kick to Tambov in their own half.
In the minute 70, Tambov awarded a free kick in their own half.
Tambov have been awarded a penalty in Ufa...
Filip Mrzljak is on a sub for Artem Golubev for Ufa.
In the minute 74, The home team replace Timur Zhamaletdinov with Dmitri Sysuev.
Ufa needs to be cautious. Tambov have an attacking throw-in.
Tambov have been awarded a corner by Alexey Valerievich Matyunin.
In the minute 76, Free kick Tambov.
At Neftyanik Stadium, Oleg Danchenko has been yellow-carded for the home team.
In Ufa Tambov drive forward through German Onugha. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 78, Tambov's Sebastien Thill breaks free at Neftyanik Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Ufa have a goal kick.
Goal! Filip Mrzljak extends Ufa's lead to 4-0.
In the minute 79, Great play from Dmitri Sysuev to set up the goal.
Tambov awarded a free kick in their own half.
Rashid Rahimov is making the team's third substitution at Neftyanik Stadium with Kirill Folmer replacing Vyacheslav Krotov.
In the minute 83, Rashid Rahimov (Ufa) is making a fourth substitution, with Catalin Carp replacing Vladislav Kamilov.
Adessoye Oyewole is replacing German Onugha for the away team.
Sergey Pervushin is making the team's fifth substitution at Neftyanik Stadium with Vladimir Kabakhidze replacing Pavel Karasev.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Ufa.
In the minute 86, Azer Aliev is replacing Oleg Danchenko for the home team.
Free kick for Ufa in their own half.
In the minute 88, Alexey Valerievich Matyunin signals a free kick to Tambov in their own half.
Komnen Andric is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
Throw-in for Tambov close to the penalty box.
Corner awarded to Tambov.
Ufa have been awarded a penalty...
The match has come to a close in Ufa. The final score is 4-0.
